title: Crusted salmon fillets
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon butter', '2 large onions, sliced', '600ml (1 pt) double cream', '4 heaped teaspoons wholegrain mustard', '6 (170g / 6 oz) fillets salmon, skinned and boned', 'salt and pepper to taste', '110g (4 oz) fresh brown breadcrumbs', '110g (4 oz) grated cheese']
